title: Did PM Narendra Modi Ignore His Security Guard Dying Of Heart Attack?
subtitle: The man who fainted on the stage was not a security officer but the state's senior most police officer and Director General of Police Amitabh Pathak
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim: The man who fainted on the stage was not a security officer but the state's senior most police officer and Director General of Police Amitabh Pathak
